name: TabPageSelector
desc: Uses [TabPageSelectorIndicator] to display a row of small circular indicators, one per tab.

fields.name: controller
fields.desc: This widget's selection and animation state.

fields.name: indicatorSize
fields.desc: The indicator circle's diameter (the default value is 12.0).

fields.name: color
fields.desc: The indicator circle's fill color for unselected pages.

fields.name: selectedColor
fields.desc: The indicator circle's fill color for selected pages and border color for all indicator circles.
